column4: so ubuntu 9.10's and 10.4's (current) gparted does not grok my osx 10.6 hfs+ partition on an external drive, should I try a gparted livecd? (dev)
for many filesystms that are not linux 'standard' you need to have installed some extra support tools for gparted to properly do things with them. No idea if this is the case for HFS+
but it is the case for ntfs
yeah I was afraid of that, because I installed everything even remotely related to hfs available, no dice
